subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: A self-regulated curfew is entirely fitting with the ethos of the team, which appears to have old-style leaders but takes an unconventional approach to most things, including play-calling.
snippet: A self-regulated curfew is entirely fitting with the ethos of the team, which appears to have old-style leaders but takes an unconventional approach to most things, including play-calling.
